statements: DELETE FROM user_behavior_data WHERE user_id = 1;
DELETE FROM user_behavior_data WHERE timestamp < '2022-05-01';
DELETE FROM user_behavior_data WHERE user_id = 1 AND behavior_description = 'clicked on a link';
DELETE FROM user_behavior_data WHERE timestamp < '2022-01-01' OR behavior_description = 'hovered over an element';
